page.title: 14POPULATION
page.content:
The population of Skelton, Ellonby and Lamonby is 410. Of these 32% are under 18 years of age, 24% are over 65 years of age and 46% are between 18 and 65 years old. Skelton has 103 houses and 270 people. Ellonby has 20 houses and 40 people. Lamonby has 30 houses and 64 people. The remaining 36 people live in homes scattered between the main communities
About one half of the families are natives of Skelton whilst half are incomers moving from other areas this gives an interesting mixture of attitudes and social groupings although natives and incomers work well together for the common good.
